users_provider_id_check.name: users_provider_id_check
users_provider_id_check.value: ("users"."provider" = 'internal' AND "users"."provider_id" IS NULL) OR ("users"."provider" != 'internal' AND "users"."provider_id" IS NOT NULL)

coupons_discount_check.name: coupons_discount_check
coupons_discount_check.value: (discount_type = 'percentage' AND discount_percentage IS NOT NULL) OR (discount_type = 'fixed_amount' AND discount_currency IS NOT NULL AND discount_amount IS NOT NULL)

coupons_valid_check.name: coupons_valid_check
coupons_valid_check.value: (valid_from IS NULL AND valid_till IS NULL) OR (valid_from IS NOT NULL AND valid_till IS NOT NULL and valid_till > valid_from)
